message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 40% of the total. Accept and we can finish the game.
You're being too generous, let's try a more realistic split.
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give away the majority of the money. It's time for you to make a serious offer.
I'll match your offer from round 1, but I'm not going to give you an even better deal. Take it or leave it.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give up yet. I think I can get a better deal.
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, but I'm willing to compromise. This is my final offer.
I'm not going to give up now. I'll take a small share, but I'll make sure you don't get the majority of the remaining value.

I'm not going to get any more of the money. If you want it all, you can have it. But don't say I didn't warn you.
